channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bollard is damaged & leaning over, 26th August
item.description:
It's on the far left of the picture

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Bath Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Complete bollard is damaged (Non illuminating bollard or post)

item.title: Broken glass by entrance to park, 26th August
item.description:
Couldn't get a photo of this but there is a large amount of brown broken glass just on your right as you enter the park on this road. I hope I have the location right as this map is very hard to read!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, London Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 26th August
item.description:
Bags of waste propped up against the retaing wall of the bridge. On the westbound side if the A417 going towards Gloucester
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockworth Bypass, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing bin, 26th August
item.description:
Bin full, extra waste building up and blowing around
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barnett Way, Barnwood, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken cement around manhole, 26th August
item.description:
A double man hole cover on the pavement has broken cement to the kerb side area This has previously been repaired with cement but buses and lorryâ€™s keep driving over the kerb causing further damage

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brookfield Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Builder's rubble dumped, 26th August
item.description:
Builder's rubble has been dumped in the car park of the Village Hall. School and play group will be restarting soon so the car park will be heavily used.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole in path leading to driveway, 26th August
item.description:
Large pothole on path that leads onto private driveway) behind the green gates of house on corner or pottersfield road and crandord close. causing damage car.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pottersfield Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on roundabout, 26th August
item.description:
2 large St George's flags poorly painted onto each roundabout.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): B4632, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 26th August
item.description:
Dumped clothing, shelving unit and other tat dumped outside of flats.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cotswold Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 26th August
item.description:
Give and take 28 day plus temporary footway closure footway abrupt level different due to tree roots please remove x1 broken rocking 600x600x20mm slab and replace with tarmac patch number 2 stats required (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet
